name: hyper-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.
